job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications on the C3 AI Platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and deployment of software applications, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy full-stack, AI-based enterprise applications on the C3 AI Platform
job_tasks.justification: The word 'deploy' in the context of applications indicates operational tasks related to making software available.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring involves explaining and guiding others, which requires strong communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications
job_tasks.justification: Reviews involve discussing and providing feedback on technical designs and code, necessitating communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Test, troubleshoot, and enhance customer software applications
job_tasks.justification: Testing, troubleshooting, and enhancing software are all fundamental software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
job_tasks.justification: Delivering deep-dives, demonstrations, and training are explicit communication and presentation tasks.
Creating specifications and documentation is an integral part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies in anticipation of customer needs
job_tasks.justification: Identifying risks, devising strategies, and anticipating needs all involve analytical problem-solving and planning.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements to the overall quality of C3 AI software
job_tasks.justification: Working closely with other teams to drive improvements emphasizes collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Mentor junior team members on coding standards and design techniques
Conduct design and development reviews of customer software applications
Deliver technical deep-dives, demonstrations, and customer training
Continuously identify technical risks and gaps; devise mitigation strategies in anticipation of customer needs
Work closely with product management and engineering to drive improvements to the overall quality of C3 AI software

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on full-stack development, deployment, testing, and customer interaction within a specific platform (C3 AI). While it mentions 'AI-based applications', it lacks specific details about core generative AI tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning LLMs. The emphasis appears to be on application development and integration rather than deep generative AI model work.
